A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sadly I didn't like this movie. Good explosions but this is not supposed to be Michael Bay film. IMAX 3D could not save The Last Jedi. Makes me appreciate the masterpieces George Lucas delivered. Disney can't buy all the franchises and just throw money at them. Art can't be rushed or whatever they did to this story. Hamill's warnings were warranted.
